--Grimlock--
 Grimlock nears the fallen ship with gun pointed towards the doors. 
Grimlock thinks to himself "Why hasn't the shields been put or the 
auto-guns brought online." Grimlock then finds is answer when he sees 
the Maximal symbol on the side of the ship.

---------------------------
Inside the ship five forms start to move with one yelling out to the 
others. "Maximals everyone operational?"

The other four robots call out saying "I am alright."

With one yelling to his commander, "Commander, the signal is getting 
closer. He is 100 meters North of the ship. Should I open the door
and 
let him in."

The commander responded, "Maximals transform into beast mode and
greet 
Commander Grimlock."

--------------------------
--Grimlock--

Grimlock looks up as he hears the door of the ship open ans sees five 
robots in their beast modes walk out. The first one to walk out had 
the shape of a Triceratops followed by a Apatosauras, with  a 
Stegosaurus following close behind with a bald eagle and a Pteronodon 
coming out the door behind him.

Grimlock calls out, "Slag, Sludge, Snarl, Swoop is that you?"

--------------------------
--Slag--
Slag calls out, "Commander Grimlock where are you, show yourself." 
Slag says with a gun pointed towards Grimlock.

Grimlock slowly shows himself when the Dinobts make their way up to 
him. 

Slag introduces the bald eagle, "Grimlock this is Thunderwing when we 
came looking for you the Maximal elders wanted us to bring
Thunderwing 
along since you has never been in battle before."
